summary: Fix for snowflake issue with multi-monitor setups like Eyefinity and Surround. This mod simply scales the 16 individual snowflakes by 1/3.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply fixes the stretched snowflake issue in the 3x1 multi-monitor setups. All this fix does is alter the DDS image for the snowflakes and scales the individual 16 snowflakes by 1/3 their size. I used evercharmer\'s \'realistic\' snowflakes from his Nicer Snowflakes mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=296 as a base because I love his higher resolution textures (512x512) which makes each snowflake 128x128 over the default 32x32.

So far all I have uploaded is the 3x1 monitor fix and have no intention of going further unless requested to do so.

Wet and Cold users can get a fix for the water drips from the mod\'s optional downloads section: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27563]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27563[/url]
